veu:
          At Agitar, we have a freely downloadable tool that provides =
basis- 
path coverage from running tests. It is the junitfactory.com plugin=
 
for Eclipse.
You don't have to use it to generate tests (it's primary pur=
pose), 
you can just use it to run your junit tests, in which case it will =

show you a summary view and a detailed view in the margins of a 
source bu=
ffer.

Hope that helps,

Bob

http://www.junitfactory.com/
See testing in a=
ction, on your own code.
